skills._schema_comment: Per-skill configuration. Each key is the skill directory name.

_schema_fields.project_name: top-level string — your private project name; the scan checks that this string doesn't appear in any published file
_schema_fields.published: boolean — true once the skill has been pushed at least once
_schema_fields.version: semver string — bumped automatically on each publish
_schema_fields.files_hash: SHA256 map of source files, used for change detection
_schema_fields.requirements: array of strings shown in README Requirements section
_schema_fields.preserve_readme: boolean — if true, your handcrafted README.md is kept instead of being regenerated
_schema_fields.exclude_files: array of relative paths to omit from the published output (e.g. private config files)
_schema_fields.strip_lines: array of strings — lines containing any of these are removed from all files
_schema_fields.extra_replacements: array of {old, new} objects applied after default_replacements
